Heading 1 – Off White 28px

Heading 2 – White 18px

Heading 3 – Medium 12px

Paragraph – Light (Default) 15px

Small text – Light (Default) 12px Text link – Light (Default) 15px

Text Utility Classes

These utility classes can be applied to any text element, not just headlines.
